long_description: A bulldog of a utility knife, the compact and efficient Gerber GDC Zip Blade is a champ at common tasks such as cutting twine, slicing into a box, stripping wire or opening clamshell packaging. The quick-release clip lets you remove this tool with one hand, leaving your other hand free to steady a load or keep things aligned. When open, a frame lock keeps the compact, 0.68 in. fine-edge blade secure, so there's no wobble when you're powering through a cut. A built-in fob lets you attach the Gerber GDC Zip Blade to the zipper of your jacket or bag, so it's close at hand when you need it. Quick-release clip allows swift removal.
short_description: A bulldog of a utility knife, the compact and efficient Gerber GDC Zip Blade is a champ at common tasks such as cutting twine, slicing into a box, stripping wire or opening clamshell packaging.
